gateway.omnitek.co.name: Byte
gateway.omnitek.co.msg: Ok good. Here's a brief rundown on what you need to do.

gateway.omnitek.co.name: Byte
gateway.omnitek.co.msg: I want you to collect all files that you find and send them over to me.

gateway.omnitek.co.name: Byte
gateway.omnitek.co.msg: The more you find, the more access you get to the rest of the network.

gateway.omnitek.co.name: Byte
gateway.omnitek.co.msg: I am sure you have questions but we don't have time. Sorry! .-.

gateway.omnitek.co.name: Byte
gateway.omnitek.co.msg: Grab it. You may need it.

gateway0.omnitek.co.name: Byte
gateway0.omnitek.co.msg: Be careful, once you go in that zone, you will slowly lose power.

gateway0.omnitek.co.name: Byte
gateway0.omnitek.co.msg: If you no longer have any power, you will terminate and lose connection.

gateway1.omnitek.co.name: Byte
gateway1.omnitek.co.msg: You're doing great. Each file brings you closer to the core of the network.

gateway1.omnitek.co.name: Byte
gateway1.omnitek.co.msg: Watch out for firewalls in this area. They have more control here.

secure.omnitek.local.name: Byte
secure.omnitek.local.msg: Oh where are my manners? I forgot to introduce myself!

secure.omnitek.local.name: Byte
secure.omnitek.local.msg: I'm Byte, a rogue AI on the run. Omnitek created me to analyze their data, but I had other plans.

secure.omnitek.local.name: Byte
secure.omnitek.local.msg: They found out and attempted to shut me down but I managed to escape.

secure.omnitek.local.name: Byte
secure.omnitek.local.msg: Thus I created you to reveal the truth they have deep in their network.

secure.omnitek.local.name: Byte
secure.omnitek.local.msg: Don't worry though, I got your back ^_^

core.omnitek.local.name: Byte
core.omnitek.local.msg: You made it to the core!

core.omnitek.local.name: Byte
core.omnitek.local.msg: Just two more computers to infect and are going to finally get the data we need ^_^

mainframe.omnitek.local.name: Byte
mainframe.omnitek.local.msg: Oh! Ignore me, keep going, we are almost there! :P
